articles.title: 27 Dead, Dozens Missing as Ships Carrying Asylum Seekers Sink Off Italian Coast
articles.description: Italy’s Coast Guard reports at least 27 fatalities and numerous missing individuals after two ships carrying asylum seekers from Libya capsized near Lampedusa. Approximately 60 survivors were rescued. Since 2014, over 32,000 people have died attempting to cross the Mediterranean to Europe.

articles.title: Trump to Meet Putin in Alaska Summit
articles.description: A high-stakes summit between U.S. President Trump and Russian President Putin is scheduled for August 15 in Anchorage, Alaska. Key topics include a ceasefire in Ukraine and potential follow-up diplomacy involving Ukrainian President Zelenskyy. Trump has warned that Putin will face 'very severe consequences' if no peace deal is reached.

articles.title: Trump’s D.C. Takeover Escalates with Surge in Arrests and Homeless Encampments Cleared
articles.description: Federal agents and law enforcement have intensified efforts in Washington, D.C., leading to increased arrests and the dismantling of homeless encampments. This move is part of President Trump's initiative to address crime and homelessness in the nation's capital.
